column1: pesto_conversion_roadrunner,train,"Construct a parameter estimation workflow for a biochemical reaction model defined in PEtab format using pyPESTO with RoadRunner as the ODE simulator. Run a multi-start optimization to estimate unknown kinetic parameters from experimental measurements. Save: (1) estimated_parameters.tsv with columns parameterId and estimate; (2) objective_summary.json containing at least the best objective value and run settings; (3) sim_vs_data_head.csv comparing simulation and measurement values (first ~50 rows); and (4) fit_plot.png illustrating model fit.","[START Preview of conditions.tsv]

pypesto_result_storage,train,"Run a parameter estimation pipeline for the PEtab conversion reaction model and save outputs under ./pred_results/: pypesto_best_parameters.csv, pypesto_summary.csv, pypesto_predictions.csv, and pypesto_results.png.","[START Preview of PESTO_conver/measurements.tsv]

pypesto_synthetic_data,train,"Perform parameter estimation for a simple inhibition model using a PEtab-formatted synthetic dataset. First generate synthetic measurements using fixed parameters, then run multi-start optimization to recover parameters. Save the estimated parameters to ./pred_results/pyPESTO_synthetic_params.csv with columns param_id and est_value.","[START Preview of measurements.tsv]
